job.title: Data Management - Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr
job.description: Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - SrDuration: 7+ monthsLocation: Plano, TX (After September has to be onsite)About The ProjectIt will be a development focused role.To make sure that we are sharing the right data that we are supposed to.To help us understanding more about the use of that data.Currently it is little bit less on machine learning and more on big data sideDay To DayPrimary responsibility are in terms of Control development.Enhancing the featuresHelping with the productionizing of what we are doingEnhancing our Python and spark detective controlsAWS: S3, EMR and EC2 use for control purpose.Jenkins experience is helpful in terms of productionisingAfter that BAU aspect will come where the person will work more on analysing part to find out what is missing and what correction is needed.Extraction of data using Restful API and Python (Panda)Perform root analysisIndividual contribution: Good Comm skills are important.Critical Technical ExpertiseBAU: Extracting data using Python (Panda)Exposure to Restful API to run some analysisGood Analytical expertise3-4 years of experience in AWS environment.SparkSQLNice to Have: Jenkins, AWS Certification is plus (Solution Architect)
